title: ENCODE Replicate
description: Schema for submitting an experimental Replicate

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

antibody.description: Antibody used with this Replicate (-IP experiments only)
antibody.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Antibody accession or UUID
antibody.title: Antibody

biological_replicate_number.description: Biologically replicated experiments are numbered sequentially
biological_replicate_number.title: Replicate # (Biological)

technical_replicate_number.description: Technically replicated experiments are numbered sequentially
technical_replicate_number.title: Replicate # (Technical)

experiment.description: Experiment dataset that this Replicate is grouped with
experiment.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Experiment dataset accession or UUID
experiment.title: Experiment ID

library.description: Nucleic acid Library used in this replicate.
library.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Library accession or UUID
library.title: Library ID

platform.description: Platform (hardware) that this Replicate was performed on
platform.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Platform name or UUID
platform.title: Platform ID

flowcell_details.description: Details about the machine/flowcell/lane information for this replicates
flowcell_details.title: Flowcell Details

machine.description: The friendly name of the specific machine platform
machine.title: Machine name

lane.description: The identifier of the lane used
lane.title: Lane

paired_ended.description: Whether or not the replicate was sequenced using  paired-end primers
paired_ended.title: Paired Ended
